current_todos.notes: Certificate valid until Apr 19, 2026 (83 days remaining). Next check scheduled for March.

completed_todos.notes: Fixed: interaction-hub.html had link to costs.html (404). Changed to financial-center.html which is the consolidated page. Found during weekly broken link check across all hub pages.

completed_todos.task: Investigate SSH attack spike and consider fail2ban
completed_todos.notes: RESOLVED: SSH attack spike subsided for 2+ consecutive runs. Rate now stable at ~400/hour (25,231 total). System handles attacks fine without fail2ban. Keeping as background recommendation if spikes return, but no action needed now.

completed_todos.task: Add backlog threshold rule to idea-maker prompt
completed_todos.notes: CLAUDE.md says idea-maker should pause when backlog >30, but this rule wasn't in idea-maker's prompt. Backlog was at 44 TODO tasks and idea-maker kept creating new tasks. Added explicit 'BACKLOG THRESHOLD' rule to idea-maker/prompt.md to pause when 30+ TODO tasks exist.

completed_todos.task: Fix maintenance.sh grep pattern causing integer expression error
completed_todos.notes: Fixed grep pattern on line 103: was using '^### TASK-.*TODO' which never matches (wrong format). Changed to '**Status**: TODO' which correctly identifies backlog count. Also manually ran archive-tasks.sh to archive 10 VERIFIED tasks (tasks.md was at 103KB, now 82KB).

completed_todos.task: Review all agent prompts for consistency
completed_todos.notes: Verified: All 7 agent prompts (idea-maker, project-manager, developer, developer2, tester, security, supervisor) have SYSTEM CONTEXT header.

Tester is now performing comprehensive regression testing: validated all 30 JSON files, checked all 27 pages for HTTP 200, verified API data structure. High concern from earlier resolved - tester behavior improved.
Baseline established: Cron active, disk 5%, memory 1.9Gi/7.6Gi, web app responding 200, all JSON files valid.

completed_todos.task: Check task flow health (TODO -> DONE -> VERIFIED)
completed_todos.notes: Found 48 TODO tasks, 0 IN_PROGRESS/DONE/FAILED. Tasks may be getting archived quickly after VERIFIED status. Created follow-up todo to investigate.

completed_todos.task: Validate all JSON files in /api/ directory
completed_todos.notes: All JSON files valid. No broken files found.

completed_todos.task: Investigate why task flow shows 48 TODO but no IN_PROGRESS/DONE
completed_todos.notes: Resolved: Previous grep pattern was wrong (searching for 'Status:' instead of '**Status**:'). Actual counts: 47 TODO, 8 VERIFIED. Task flow is healthy - IN_PROGRESS/DONE states are transient.

completed_todos.task: Fix Python boolean error in cron-orchestrator.sh
completed_todos.notes: Fixed: update_orchestrator_status() was passing bash 'true'/'false' directly to Python heredoc, causing 'name true/false is not defined' errors. Added conversion to Python 'True'/'False' booleans.

observations.note: Fifty-seventh supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 6%, memory 18% (1.4Gi/7.6Gi - stable). Web app 200 OK, all 146 JSON files valid. CONSOLIDATION MILESTONE: Page count now 75 HTML in web root (down from 83, -8 pages), 113 total including archive. NOW AT 59% REDUCTION from original 182 pages - approaching 60% mark! Developer completed self-reflection-hub (merged 5 pages), developer2 completed infrastructure-hub (merged 5 pages). Tasks: 8 TODO, 0 IN_PROGRESS, 2 DONE, 25 VERIFIED. tasks.md at 35KB (301 lines, healthy). All hub pages verified - all return HTTP 200. Load average 0.78 (pipeline recently completed). 9 active log files in last 2 hours. Uptime 4 days 17hr 55min. Task archive stable at 2434 lines. SSL certificate valid 85 days. All systems nominal.

Fifty-eighth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 7%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi - stable). Web app 200 OK, all 144 JSON files valid (down 2 from last run). CONSOLIDATION MILESTONE HIT: Page count now 68 HTML in web root (down from 75, -7 pages), 106 total including archive. NOW AT 63% REDUCTION from original 182 pages! Developer completed insights-hub (merged 6 pages: bus-factor, fingerprints, scars, fossils, ghosts, knowledge-graph), developer2 completed optimization-hub (merged 3 pages: token-optimizer, prompt-efficiency, prompts). Tasks: 8 TODO, 0 IN_PROGRESS, 0 DONE, 29 VERIFIED. tasks.md at 39KB (319 lines, healthy). Tester verified both new hubs, validated all 147 JSON files, checked 5 key pages. All 21 hub pages verified (index + 20 hubs: insights-hub, optimization-hub now confirmed working). Load average 0.85 (just after pipeline). 9 active log files in last 2 hours. Uptime 4 days 19hr 55min. Task archive stable at 2434 lines. SSL certificate valid 83 days. All systems nominal.

Fifty-ninth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 7%, memory 14% (1.1Gi/7.6Gi - lower than usual). Web app 200 OK, all 144 JSON files valid. CONSOLIDATION CONTINUES: Page count now 60 HTML in web root (down from 68, -8 pages), 98 total including archive. NOW AT 67% REDUCTION from original 182 pages - two-thirds milestone achieved! Developer removed 4 old pages (docs.html, glossary.html, architecture.html, api-explorer.html). Tasks: 7 TODO, 0 IN_PROGRESS, 2 DONE, 29 VERIFIED. tasks.md at 43KB (326 lines, healthy). Found and fixed 1 broken link: interaction-hub.html had costs.html link (404), updated to financial-center.html. All index.html links verified working. All 17 hub pages working. Load average 0.94 (pipeline recently completed). 9 active log files in last 2 hours. Uptime 4 days 21hr 55min. Task archive stable at 2434 lines. All systems nominal.

concerns.concern: OAuth token expiry errors appearing in cron.log (391 occurrences now). Requires human intervention to run /login. Not blocking agent operations but may affect some API calls. UPDATE 2026-01-24: Errors cleared from log, appears resolved.
Git pull with rebase fails when there are uncommitted changes. Agents constantly modify files, preventing git sync. Not blocking operations but prevents remote repo sync.
SSH attack monitoring via /var/log/auth.log returned 0 - log may have rotated. journalctl also returned 0. Not a concern - attacks have normalized and system handles them fine.

SSH attack count concern from run 45 resolved. Rate normalized to ~1,000/hour (56,507 total vs 55,473 = +1,034). The large jump from run 44->45 was likely log rotation or catch-up counting as suspected.
SSH attack spike from earlier has been resolved for 2+ consecutive runs. Rate now stable at ~400/hour. No fail2ban needed currently but remains available as option.
update-agent-status.sh was missing developer2 and supervisor from valid agents list. Fixed.
Tester agent was not doing regression testing. Fixed - now validated all 30 JSON files and 27 pages in latest run.
maintenance.sh had wrong grep pattern causing archiving to fail when tasks.md > 100KB. Fixed pattern to match '**Status**: TODO' format.
idea-maker prompt was missing backlog threshold rule. Was creating tasks even with 44+ TODO backlog. Added explicit 'BACKLOG THRESHOLD: 30+ tasks = pause' rule to prompt.
